name: HODL
description: HODL is a DeFi ecosystem on Binance Smart Chain (BSC) that rewards holders with weekly BNB payouts funded by a 5% transaction tax and additional revenue streams like NFTs, staking, and gaming. These rewards are sustainable, thanks to a multi-faceted ecosystem that supports the reward pool and offers diverse earning opportunities. Holders can reinvest their rewards into $HODL to unlock benefits like reduced taxes and faster reward claims, adding flexibility to the reward system.
